story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: From a chance encounter to a lifetime of adventures. Here are the moments that brought us here.
story.firstMeetingDesc: We met at a coffee shop in São Paulo. It started with a simple 'Is this seat taken?' and turned into a 3-hour conversation about travel and dreams.
story.firstTripDesc: Our first adventure took us to Bahia. We fell in love with the energy, the people, and the stunning beaches of Porto Seguro.
story.movingInDesc: We decided to build a home together. A small apartment, two cats, and endless laughter.
story.proposalDesc: Under the stars in Atacama, Bruno got down on one knee. It was the easiest 'Yes' of Ana's life.

guide.title: Bahia Guide
guide.subtitle: Explore the magic of Porto Seguro and its surroundings. Here are our favorite spots and essential tips for your stay.
guide.espelho: Praia do Espelho: Stunning cliffs and pools.
guide.nativos: Praia dos Nativos (Trancoso): Lively and beautiful.
guide.foodTip: Don't leave without trying Acarajé and a fresh Cacao juice!
guide.airportDesc: The main gateway to your adventure.
guide.venueDesc: Where the magic happens! All-inclusive resort on Mutá Beach.
guide.historicDesc: Step back in time in the discovery place of Brazil.
guide.trancosoDesc: Charming village with colorful houses and great dining.
